name: Cyber 24
description:
Make your way to class in the year 2024.  ['WASD' to move and 'K' to grab]

Small project experimenting with pacing and difficulty in a side scroller game.

Special thanks to 

Alex Golebiowski & Evan Sawatsky for playtesting and providing meaningful feedback :)

Music - https://soundcloud.com/retr0-red/wired-in
